duties_responsibilities.duty: Operate equipment for the handling and production of packaged gas cylinders, both for high pressure and liquefied gases.
Load and unload gas cylinders and/or other products onto and off of route trucks and trailers, sorting empty cylinders by type and handling high-pressure, medical, and liquid cylinders.

Prepare high-pressure cylinders and cryogenic vessels for filling, attach to manifold, evacuate cylinders to eliminate contaminants, and perform basic cylinder maintenance such as painting, labeling, and cleaning.

Inspect cylinders prior to filling, conduct safety checks per procedures, fill cylinders by pressure and weight, check for cylinder quantities, styles, and products, and manage paperwork to DOT, FDA, OSHA, and Airgas standards.
Comply with all government and company standards relating to the safe handling of hazardous materials/cylinder gases.

education_certification.credential: HS Diploma or equivalent preferred. One year of experience in manufacturing operations or loading experience preferred.
